list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Implement logging system for user's dealt hands
This commit introduces a new logging system to the program, specifically for logging a user's dealt hands. It utilizes the File class to create and manage a separate file for logging purposes. The logging system captures and records the hands of the players during the game, providing a detailed record for analysis or debugging purposes.

task.summary:
feat: Add card class, Rank, and Suit enum
This commit adds the Card class to represent a playing card in the game. Additionally, it introduces the Rank enum to define the rank of the cards (e.g., Ace, King, Queen, etc.) and the Suit enum to represent the suit of the cards (e.g., Hearts, Diamonds, Spades, Clubs).

feat: Implement Deck and Hand classes
This commit introduces the Deck class responsible for managing the deck of playing cards and the Hand class to represent a player's hand in the game.

feat: Complete initial version with GameController, GUI, and App classes
This commit marks the completion of the initial version of the card game program. It includes the GameController class responsible for managing game logic, the GUI class for displaying the game interface, and the App class serving as the entry point for the application.

feat: Implement logging system for user's dealt hands
This commit introduces a new logging system to the program, specifically for logging a user's dealt hands. It utilizes the File class to create and manage a separate file for logging purposes. The logging system captures and records the hands of the players during the game, providing a detailed record for analysis or debugging purposes.
